name: Blockin’ Color - Puzzle Game
description:
You’ve never played a block matching game like this one! In Blockin’ Color, the aim of the game is a classic — match the colors on the block tiles to the colors of the board. But it’s so challenging — you’ll have to use your brain for this one and train hard! But it’s so addictive, it will keep you entertained for hours. What better way to have fun?!

HOW TO PLAY:

Try to fit the pieces of the puzzle together. Match the greens, blacks, whites, and more to build the shape in the picture. Simple, right? Nope — one wrong tile, and it’ll knock your whole plan out. So are you ready to try and beat the game in Blockin’ Color?
